div.ab: zōt ud rāspīg: Anklesaria, Kotwal and Boyd.

RecitationInstruction.ab: Y6.1a daδuuā̊ŋhəm ahurəm mazdąm...] daδuuā̊ŋhəm ahurəm mazdą̇m yaz. OD yeŋ́hē (Y6.22) 40.

Parallels.ab: daδuuā̊ŋhəm ahurəm mazdąm yazamaide = Y16.4, Y16.5, Y16.6.

ab.ab: "The chief priest (and) the assistant priest both recite. The chief priest, taking water from the water container, pours (it) on the bundle."
